doc.field: Photographs of vacant lots in Gowanus
Photographs of vacant lots in Gowanus

The Photographs of vacant lots in Gowanus consist of two modern black-and-white photographic prints (reproductions) of Library of Congress photographs showing vacant lots in the Gowanus neighborhood of Brooklyn, circa 1920. The photographs show the area near 2nd Street and 4th Avenue and include views of vacant lots, views of distant buildings surrounding the lots, and views of people working in the lots.

The photographs show the area near 2nd Street and 4th Avenue and include views of vacant lots, views of distant buildings surrounding the lots, and views of people working in the lots.
Source and date of acquisition for this collection are unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1990.
